sentences.sContent: At this point we have fully specified our service.
sentences.sContent_eng: At this point we have fully specified our service.
sentences.sCn: 至此，我们已经完成了服务的全部指定。

sentences.sContent: In the case of two blade chassis, each node group should be specified on each blade.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the case of two blade chassis, each node group should be specified on each blade.
sentences.sCn: 在存在两个刀片机箱的情况下，每个刀片上都应指定每个节点组。

sentences.sContent: After you have specified which operation of one interface corresponds to which operation of another interface, you need to map the operation parameters.
sentences.sContent_eng: After you have specified which operation of one interface corresponds to which operation of another interface, you need to map the operation parameters.
sentences.sCn: 在指定一个接口的哪个操作对应于另一个接口的哪个操作以后，您需要映射操作参数。

synos.tran: 指定；详细说明（specify的过去分词）

phrases.pCn: 除另有规定外；除非另有说明

words.tran: 特殊的，特定的；明确的；详细的；[药] 具有特效的
[计] 说明符；指示语；[计] 区分符
指定；详细说明；列举；把…列入说明书
